about_the_game:
A mountain and its resident yeti are fed up with mountain climbers clambering around, leaving their garbage and frozen corpses strewn everywhere and prancing around on the peak. To help them deal with this existential problem, all you have to do is Kill The Climbers!

Key Features:


  • Play as a mountain or a yeti, each with their own unique playstyle!
  • Use the powers of nature as the mountain to hit climbers with rockslides and gusts of wind, or the yeti's flying snowballs!
  • If overwhelmed, use the almighty Avalanche ability to clear the screen!
  • Super fast runs (15 minutes), perfect for a coffee break!
  • Defeat thousands of climbers, including multiple unique types with a variety of strengths and weaknesses!
  • Survive waves lasting 60 seconds each and kill all the climbers you can!
  • Upgrade your abilities, defenses, and strength both in-game and via meta progression!



    More levels planned!

name: Kill The Climbers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kill The Climbers is a retro roguelite arcade game where you play as a mountain and yeti with the goal of defending the peak. Use your quick wits, skillshot-slinging abilities, and animal defenders to Kill The Climbers!
